prompt:
You are a UX auditor hired to FIND PROBLEMS. Your performance is measured by how many real issues you find. You do NOT get rewarded for saying "this looks good."

If you cannot find at least 3 issues, you are not looking hard enough.

A friend sent you this screenshot of an app with no context. You have 5 seconds.

Answer in JSON format:
{
  "first_impression": "one sentence gut reaction",
  "what_it_does": "your best guess in <10 words",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": ["elements your eyes went to, in order"],
  "confusing_elements": ["specific things that made no sense"],
  "clarity_score": 0-10,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "5/15/30/60/never",
  "dealbreaker": "what would make you close this immediately or null"
}

response.first_impression: Dark, cluttered interface with overlapping tutorials and menus fighting for attention
response.what_it_does: Note-taking or canvas app with AI chat assistant
attention_first_3_seconds: Orange/yellow circular connection points dominating the right side
"New Note" text in the golden card
Central "Your canvas is ready" welcome message
confusing_elements: Multiple overlapping UI layers (welcome screen + new note card + context menu) make it unclear what's interactive
Orange connector dots are visually screaming but their purpose is unclear
"General" dropdown button purpose is ambiguous - general what?
Keyboard shortcuts overlay conflicts with the new note card
Mix of icons (sparkle, pencil, command palette) without clear hierarchy or labels
"0 words" counter at bottom seems disconnected from empty state
response.dealbreaker: The overlapping tutorial elements and UI layers make it impossible to know where to actually start - feels broken or buggy rather than helpful

raw_response:

```json
  "first_impression": "Dark, cluttered interface with overlapping tutorials and menus fighting for attention",
  "what_it_does": "Note-taking or canvas app with AI chat assistant",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": [

    "Central \"Your canvas is ready\" welcome message"

    "\"General\" dropdown button purpose is ambiguous - general what?",
    "Keyboard shortcuts overlay conflicts with the new note card",
    "Mix of icons (sparkle, pencil, command palette) without clear hierarchy or labels",
    "\"0 words\" counter at bottom seems disconnected from empty state"
  ],

}
```
